extendedInfo.description: Stop playing Sudoku on your own, and start challenging yourself with your friends or others in a competition. SudokuChallenge allows you to play online against other players you have linked with, and truly see who is faster to complete the same assigned Sudoku puzzles as part of a competition.SudokuChallenge is not a real time Sudoku application as it requires a critical mass of players. This feature will be available shortly.You initiate a challenge to someone (a friend or random), you wait it is accepted, and then you can start completing the puzzles. The winner is declared after both players have completed the 3 assigned puzzles.Features:- Traditional Sudoku, i.e., play on your own- A Daily Challenge; all players, same grid... at the end of the day, the winner is declared.- 3 difficulty levels supported.- 3 puzzles per challenge of the same complexity to complete with a friend. You need to win at aleast 2 to be declared the winner.- You can play offline. The app will sync up as soon as connectivity is back, and see whom the winner is.- Two players, multiple players.- You can link and play with random players.- Hints.- Notification message when your challenger has initiated a challenge with you, or finished ahead of you.

reviews.title: Addictive for me
reviews.comment: I like playing the Complex games. Just when I thought that there were no solution to a game than guessing...I find a way then I like comparing my speed against another player. I also keep trying to land myself on the Top 5 of their Daily Challenge
reviews.author: Aimee Galias

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love this app. In response to the below comment, I love the pause feature... not so I can think on the puzzle but because I have a crazy life and am frequently interrupted in my day and per Murphy\'s Law it usually happens when I\'m playing. That said I probably only use it @ 25% of the time.
reviews.author: Naomi Patrick
